text.div:
MedicationRequestSubjectNameSearchParameter

Parameter subject.name:string

Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?subject:Patient.name={name}

ResourceMedicationRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesMedicationRequest
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: MedicationRequestSubjectNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?subject:Patient.name={name}
